title: How to Make a Tasty Nacho Like Dish

steps.headline: Spread the chips evenly over the plate as if you were making nachos.
Put leftover chili or refried beans on top of the chips.
steps.description: You may use any amount you want.

steps.headline: (Optional) Spread grated cheese over chili or refried beans and place in the oven or microwave.
Get a fork, eat, and enjoy.

text:
Spread the chips evenly over the plate as if you were making nachos. Put leftover chili or refried beans on top of the chips. You may use any amount you want. (Optional) Spread grated cheese over chili or refried beans and place in the oven or microwave. Microwave- Heat on high for about 3 minutes, or until cheese melts. If chili or refried beans are still cold, heat for a minute longer until the desired temperature is reached. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/f/f8/Make-a-Tasty-Nacho-Like-Dish-Step-4-Version-2.jpg/v4-460px-Make-a-Tasty-Nacho-Like-Dish-Step-4-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/f/f8/Make-a-Tasty-Nacho-Like-Dish-Step-4-Version-2.jpg/aid9690-v4-728px-Make-a-Tasty-Nacho-Like-Dish-Step-4-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"546","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Convectional oven- Heat at 350 °F (177 °C) until cheese melts or chili/refried beans are hot. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/3/39/Make-a-Tasty-Nacho-Like-Dish-Step-5-Version-2.jpg/v4-460px-Make-a-Tasty-Nacho-Like-Dish-Step-5-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/3/39/Make-a-Tasty-Nacho-Like-Dish-Step-5-Version-2.jpg/aid9690-v4-728px-Make-a-Tasty-Nacho-Like-Dish-Step-5-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"546","licensing":"

"} Get a fork, eat, and enjoy.
